document.full_text: the sentencing of a blogger to jail for criticizing egypt's army has drawn a chorus of objections from rights groups, who say the country's ruling military council is drawing red lines around free speech.
document.title: rights groups condemn egypt blogger jail sentence
lines_and_colors: the sentencing of a blogger to jail for criticizing egypt's army has drawn a chorus of objections from rights groups, who say the country's ruling military council is drawing red lines around free speech.
